channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260115)
item.description:
What's New

Fix: Allow digraph + w patterns (thw, chw, khw, etc.) in Telex modes

  • Add digraphWClusters Set for valid Vietnamese consonant digraph + w patterns:

thw→thư, chw→chư, khw→khư, phw→phư, trw→trư, nhw→như, ngw→ngư

  • Remove 'thw' from impossible3LetterPrefixes (valid in Telex/Simple Telex 2)
  • Add 3-letter prefix check in startsWithImpossiblePatternForRawInput

Note: 'ghw' and 'nghw' are excluded because 'gh' and 'ngh' only appear

before i, e, ê vowels in Vietnamese (not ư).

Fixes issue where typing 'thw' in Telex or Simple Telex 2 mode

incorrectly kept 'thw' instead of converting to 'thư'.

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
